text:
Friendly trainer! Very accomodating and flexible timings. Jereme is able to book courts at his place or near by which is very convenient.

Lessons are very chill, easy to attend while always being focused on key skills/stroke to make you a better tennis player.

After the few lessons with Jereme, we managed to pick up tennis as beginners and can now play it socially. Thank you!

My son has been learning tennis from scratch with Jereme for the past six months, he enjoyed the class a lot. Jereme is an outstanding coach—patient, funny, and highly responsible. We’re so grateful for his dedication and guidance!”
Jereme is a great coach! Very friendly and patient. His feedback has improved my play and I definitely would recommend anyone to come and learn.

Jereme was a great instructor for my 12 year old who decided to take up tennis as a new sport. In 5 sessions he went from no knowledge at all, to being able to consistently hit the ball over the net. Thank you Jereme!

Jereme is an outstanding tennis coach! His patience, clear instructions, and ability to break down techniques have really improved my game. He tailors each lesson to my needs, and I’ve noticed significant progress in both my skills and confidence. Highly recommend Jereme for anyone looking to level up their tennis!
